name: Idle Prison Manager
description:
Game introduction

Now it's your turn to build a prison to accommodate the most vicious inhabitants! You need to plan all the rooms and arrange the daily activities of all the prisoners!

Game features

In this game , you can experience these things :
- Eleven prisons
- Count 10 different rooms
- More than 300 kinds of criminals
- Multilayer Prison
developers: 上海畅跃信息技术有限公司
